content: This Tiger happens to be a big fan of lunging attacks, and will almost always start the fight by leaping at you low to the ground, clawing at you with his free hand as he comes to a stop. He’ll follow this with a slash from his sword rather quickly, and let the momentum carry him along the ground in a spin to perform a quick secondary overhead slash from his low position.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard_(Kingdom_of_Sahali).md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard (Kingdom of Sahali)', specifically from the subsection '"Tiger Vanguard" Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
This Tiger happens to be a big fan of lunging attacks, and will almost always start the fight by leaping at you low to the ground, clawing at you with his free hand as he comes to a stop. He’ll follow this with a slash from his sword rather quickly, and let the momentum carry him along the ground in a spin to perform a quick secondary overhead slash from his low position.
